creator: apache@schiegl.com
text:
Compiling latest trunk (471037) fails with:

...
make[4]: Entering directory `/opt/packages/cvs-httpd/httpd-trunk/modules/proxy'
/opt/packages/cvs-httpd/httpd-trunk/srclib/apr/libtool --silent --mode=compile
gcc -g -Wall -Wmissing-prototypes -Wstrict-prototypes -Wmissing-declarations 
-DSSL_ENGINE_EXPERIMENTAL -DFCGI_DUMP_ENV_VARS  -DSOLARIS2=10
-D_POSIX_PTHREAD_SEMANTICS -D_REENTRANT -D_LARGEFILE64_SOURCE -DAP_DEBUG   
-I/opt/packages/cvs-httpd/httpd-trunk/srclib/pcre -I.
-I/opt/packages/cvs-httpd/httpd-trunk/os/unix
-I/opt/packages/cvs-httpd/httpd-trunk/server/mpm/experimental/event
-I/opt/packages/cvs-httpd/httpd-trunk/modules/http
-I/opt/packages/cvs-httpd/httpd-trunk/modules/filters
-I/opt/packages/cvs-httpd/httpd-trunk/modules/proxy
-I/opt/packages/cvs-httpd/httpd-trunk/include
-I/opt/packages/cvs-httpd/httpd-trunk/modules/generators
-I/opt/packages/cvs-httpd/httpd-trunk/modules/mappers
-I/opt/packages/cvs-httpd/httpd-trunk/modules/database
-I/opt/packages/cvs-httpd/httpd-trunk/srclib/apr/include
-I/opt/packages/cvs-httpd/httpd-trunk/srclib/apr-util/include
-I/opt/openldap/include/
-I/opt/packages/cvs-httpd/httpd-trunk/srclib/apr-util/xml/expat/lib
-I/opt/packages/cvs-httpd/httpd-trunk/server
-I/opt/packages/cvs-httpd/httpd-trunk/modules/proxy/../generators
-I/opt/openssl/include -I/opt/packages/cvs-httpd/httpd-trunk/modules/ssl
-I/opt/packages/cvs-httpd/httpd-trunk/modules/dav/main -prefer-pic -c
proxy_util.c && touch proxy_util.slo
proxy_util.c: In function `is_socket_connected':
proxy_util.c:2130: error: `FIONREAD' undeclared (first use in this function)
proxy_util.c:2130: error: (Each undeclared identifier is reported only once
proxy_util.c:2130: error: for each function it appears in.)
make[4]: *** [proxy_util.slo] Error 1

Found the reason + solution at:
http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/tomcat-dev/200609.mbox/%3C20060903210448.51A501A981A@eris.apache.org%3E

Adding "#include <sys/filio.h>" to modproxy_util.c did it. strange nobody else
hit this...

creator: apache@schiegl.com
text:
okay, next time i just wait a few days longer...
svn commit: r473278 to /httpd/httpd/trunk/modules/proxy/proxy_util.c fixed it.
